profile_summary: Computer Vision specialist with 9 years of experience in mobility and autonomous systems. Built end-to-end CV pipelines for real-time object detection, localization, and tracking.

experience.title: CV Engineer, AutoVision AG; Stuttgart, Germany — 2020–Present
experience.summary: Developed YOLOv5-based object detection system for autonomous driving. Achieved 97% mAP in road environments.

experience.title: AI Engineer, RoboDrive Systems; Karlsruhe, Germany — 2017–2020
experience.summary: Built depth estimation models with stereo vision and OpenCV. Contributed to ROS stack integration.

experience.title: Research Assistant, Fraunhofer IOSB; Mannheim, Germany — 2015–2017
experience.summary: Published 3 papers on vision-based vehicle tracking. Worked on SLAM and real-time video analytics.
